name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WorkHub - To make WorkHub your startup page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will set app.workhub.ai as the startup page and upon click, it will open app.workhub.ai for you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install this extension and with a single click make the Dashboard of WorkHub start page of Google Chrome. Dashboard has options to communicate with your team, reward your team and get recognition from them and manage tickets for the entire team.
